From: Burton Paulu
Subject: NAEB Board meeting in connection with
Institute for Education by Radio-Television
The ISRT this year will run from Monday
morning. May 12, through Wednesday, May 140 Therefore,
I should like to call the NAEB, Board of Directors
into session at 10:00 a. m. Sunday morning, May 11,
with meetings to continue that afternoon and
evening,.
